results.idea: Earnings momentum adjusted by analyst confidence (street rating)
results.description: Combine mdl77_momemtumanalystmodel_qma_repearnmom and mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_stockrating. Both high coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after big industry-adjusted gains
results.description: Reverse mdl77_400_indrelrtn5d_ to find overbought industry-relative winners for reversion. Single-field alpha (SUGGESTION1 not applied because single is simple). Coverage high; SUGGESTION4: field has many users. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum with fundamental momentum filter: price momentum times earnings momentum composite
results.description: Combine mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp and mdl77_valuemomemtummodel_reportedearningsmomentummodule. Both high coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Return to mean for 5-day industry outlier
results.description: Use mdl77_400_indrelrtn5d_ and negative sign to capture reversal. Single-field, high coverage. SUGGESTION1 skipped to maintain simplicity. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum-weighted fundamentals: tstalp times fundamentals rank zscore
results.description: Combine mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp and zscore(mdl77_qsa_efficiency). Use zscore operator to normalize (within 7 operators limit). Both high coverage/user. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: High buyback + low leverage signal
results.description: Combine mdl77_2capdistp and reverse(mdl77_400_booklev) to capture firms returning capital while deleveraging. Both high coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High momentum with low option implied volatility
results.description: Combine mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp and reverse(mdl77_liquidityriskfactor_atmcallvol). Both high coverage/user. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High FCF per share growth vs price (3-yr)
results.description: Combine mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_pfcfy3ghc (3-yr change in price-adj TTM FCF) with mdl77_2deepvaluefactor_ttmcapexp. Both high coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Price strength with low accounting accruals filter
results.description: Combine mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp and reverse(mdl77_earningsqualityfactor_ttmaccu). Both high coverage/user. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Industry-relative revenue-to-price breakout
results.description: Combine mdl77_2pricemomentumfactor_p50_200ratio (50/200 MA) and mdl177_2_globaldevnorthamerica_v502_curindsp_ (industry relative sales-to-price). p50_200 coverage 1.0; industry-rel coverage 0.6073 -> ts_backfill if needed but acceptable. SUGGESTION4 applied where possible. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Stable growth with rising returns: R-sqr of FCF trend times ROE
results.description: Combine mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_y3fcfq4rqsr (R-sqr of 3-yr FCF) and mdl177_relativevaluemodel_roe. Both high coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Price momentum normalized by market cap (size-neutral momentum)
results.description: Divide momentum by ln market cap to favor smaller momentum names. Use mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp and mdl77_liquidityriskfactor_nlmktcap (coverage 1.0). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High EPS growth signal adjusted for earnings quality skew
results.description: Combine mdl77_2earningmomentumfactor400_gspea2y and reverse(mdl77_earningsqualityfactor_salerec) to favor growth with clean earnings. Both high coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: FCF yield vs inventory stability
results.description: Combine fcf_yield_times_forward_roe and mdl77_ohistoricalgrowthfactor_cv4qsales3y (sales CV) to favor high FCF yield with stable sales. Both high coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Analyst alert times momentum: high alert rank with strong 3m returns
results.description: Combine mdl77_garpanalystmodel_qgp_alert and mdl77_2pricemomentumfactor_actrtn3m. Both high coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Earnings quality & FCF growth composite
results.description: Add mdl77_earningsqualityfactor_vniu (inventory diff) and mdl77_ohistoricalgrowthfactor_pctchg3yfcf to find firms with quality and FCF growth. Both high coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum signal suppressed by high option skew (avoid crowded vols)
results.description: Subtract mdl77_voldiff_pc from mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp to penalize momentum where put-call skew is high. Both high coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: High sales growth normalized by market cap
results.description: Divide mdl77_2historicalgrowthfactor_totalsaleg by mdl77_liquidityriskfactor_nlmktcap to find growing small caps. Both high coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Quality momentum: fundamentals rank times 12m active return
results.description: Combine mdl77_qsa_efficiency and mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn12m. Both high coverage/user. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.71.
